title: Looking For a Team !!!!
body:
Ever since i started playing League , i've always envied the 'Rush Hour ' duo bottom lane . The ability to have 2 people consistently applying pressure and the threat of getting ahead will lead to snowball  the game. Their synergy 'IMO' was the best the game has ever seen still to present day. I'm making this post in hopes that there is a team that accompany this certain aspect of friendship,hard work and synergy will see comforting. Although i'm only a silver player, i will work hard to be the player needed for anything, any role . I have alot of room to grow and i'm a fast learner , i just want to have another experience to the game i've never had before. Looking for a structured team and people who can play everyday , please comment below or add me ig L3V3NDI 

Kind Regards

replies.body: Hey there L3V3NDI, feel free to join https://discord.gg/Y93kJJN , we have over a dozen players currently climbing through silver. Regarding advice for the game, we also have a few veterens who have played since the beta and are very good at the game and I am sure would be able to answer any of your questions.
Hey Twèd, i tried to add you on league although no response also when i received this comment , the link to discord had expired .
